Package: com.aestasit.infrastructure.ssh.dsl

[Groovy] Class RemoteFile

    • com.aestasit.infrastructure.ssh.dsl.RemoteFile

    • This class represents a remote file and it gives some methods to access file's content.

      Authors:
      Andrey Adamovich
      Luciano Fiandesio
